content: Do you ever procrastinate over your inbox? We all know email is a big time suck. I have found a way to nail this particular distraction – and even automated it (as suggested here!), into an app you can download. Simple tools can enable you to spend less time and get more done. Instead of trying to read and respond all at once, try listening to your email in your car first. Our app speaking email gives you the freedom to listen to your email during otherwise unproductive time – greatly increasing your ability to focus on the task when you are working.
